截的也只是部分，但是可以看到是写错了...你再看看这个格式...对比下你自己是怎么写错的...

{
        "ouo.unravel": {"sounds": [{"name": "unravel","stream": true}]},
        "ouo.py": {"sounds": [{"name": "custom/py","stream": true}]},
        "abc": {"sounds": [{"name": "custom/ccc","stream": false}]}
}复制代码
